channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA -- GeForce Experience
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NVIDIA -- GeForce Experience

item.title: CVE-2019-5702|2024-08-04T20:01:52.203Z -- nvidia -- geforce%20experience
item.description: NVIDIA GeForce Experience, all versions prior to 3.20.2, contains a vulnerability when GameStream is enabled in which an attacker with local system access can corrupt a system file, which may lead to denial of service or escalation of privileges.
